# Interface Goal

Goal definition for goal advancement

This interface was referenced by `InworldBasicConfigurationSchema`'s JSON-Schema via the `definition` "Goal".

interface Goal {  
motivation?: string;  
name: string;  
repeatable?: string | boolean;  
}

##### Index

### Properties

motivation? name repeatable?

## Properties

### `Optional`motivation

motivation?: string

Motivation or purpose of the goal

### name

name: string

Unique identifier of the goal

### `Optional`repeatable

repeatable?: string | boolean

Whether the goal can be repeated
